summary.span: 表示允许用户从其子元素中选择项的控件。

span.span: Represents a control that allows a user to select items from among its child elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，这意味着它可以包含的任何类型 （如字符串、 图像或面板） 的对象的集合。 is an , which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 清除的可视化树中删除项目容器时附加属性。 clears the attached property when the item container is removed from the visual tree. 这样为了使项容器运行正常时使用容器回收。This is done so item containers behave correctly when the uses container recycling. 有关详细信息，请参阅和"容器回收"中[优化性能： 控件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md)。For more information, see and "Container Recycling" in [Optimizing Performance: Controls](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/optimizing-performance-controls.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置指示 是否应当使 与 属性中的当前项保持同步的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a should keep the synchronized with the current item in the property.

value.span: 如果 始终与 中的当前项保持同步，则为 ；如果 从不与当前项保持同步，则为 ；如果 只有在 使用 时才与当前项保持同步，则为 。

span.span: if the is always synchronized with the current item in the ; if the is never synchronized with the current item; if the is synchronized with the current item only if the uses a .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以设置属性`true`以确保始终选定的项对应于中的属性。You can set the property to `true` to ensure that the item selected always corresponds to the property in the . 例如，假设有两个与控制其属性设置为相同的源。For example, suppose that there are two controls with their property set to the same source. 设置到`true`这两个列表框，以确保在每个选定的项上相同。Set to `true` on both list boxes to ensure that the selected item in each is the same. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage <*object* `IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem`=""/><*object* `IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem`=""/> \- 或 -\- or - <*object* `IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem`="{}"/><*object* `IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem`="{}"/> ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例将两个绑定控件添加到相同。The following example binds two controls to the same . 因为设置为`true`上每个，所选的项目始终属于相同的两个控件Because is set to `true` on each , the selected item is always the same for both controls [!code-xaml[Selector#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Selector/CS/Window1.xaml#2)] [!code-xaml[Selector#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Selector/CS/Window1.xaml#4)]

.property instance int32 SelectedIndex
Public Property SelectedIndex As Integer
public: property int SelectedIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置当前选择中第一项的索引，如果选择为空，则返回负一(-1)。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the first item in the current selection or returns negative one (-1) if the selection is empty.

value.span: 当前选择中第一个项的索引。

span.span: The index of first item in the current selection.
The default value is negative one (-1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果支持选择单个项，属性返回的选定项的索引。If a supports selecting a single item, the property returns the index of the selected item. 如果支持多个选择返回用户第一次选定的项的索引。If a supports multiple selections, returns the index of the item that the user selected first. 设置中可支持多个选择清除现有选定项并将所选内容设置为索引指定的项。Setting in a that supports multiple selections clears existing selected items and sets the selection to the item specified by the index. 如果选择为空，则返回-1。 returns -1 if selection is empty. 如果你设置为小于-1，值引发。If you set to a value less that -1, an is thrown. 如果你设置为等于或大于子元素的数目的值，忽略的值。If you set to a value equal or greater than the number of child elements, the value is ignored. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下面的示例创建和设置为 1，后者选择中的第二个项的属性。The following example creates a and sets the property to 1, which selects the second item in the . [!code-xaml[ListBoxItems_snip#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxItems_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml#2)] 下面的示例使用属性来确定索引 0 处的项是否为所选内容中的第一个项。The following example uses the property to determine whether the item at index 0 is the first item in the selection. [!code-csharp[ListBoxItems_snip#SelectorSelectedIndex](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxItems_snip/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#selectorselectedindex)] [!code-vb[ListBoxItems_snip#SelectorSelectedIndex](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxItems_snip/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#selectorselectedindex)]

summary.span: 获取或设置当前选择中的第一项，或者，如果选择为空，则返回 null。

span.span: Gets or sets the first item in the current selection or returns null if the selection is empty

value.span: 当前选择中的第一个项，或者在选择为空时为 。

span.span: The first item in the current selection or if the selection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果支持选择单个项，属性返回的所选的项。If a supports selecting a single item, the property returns the selected item. 如果支持多个选择返回用户第一次选择的项。If a supports multiple selections, returns the item that the user selected first. 设置中可支持多个选择清除现有选定项并将所选内容设置为指定的项。Setting in a that supports multiple selections clears existing selected items and sets the selection to the item specified. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下面的示例获取从。The following example gets the from a . [!code-csharp[ListBoxEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxEvent/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ListBoxEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxEvent/VisualBasic/Pane1.xaml.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置通过使用 而获取的 的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the , obtained by using .
The value of the selected item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定用于确定值的属性的路径属性。The property specifies the path to the property that is used to determine the value of the property. 设置X 尝试为值选择其值的计算结果为 X 的项; 如果找不到任何此类项，清除所选内容。Setting to a value X attempts to select an item whose value evaluates to X; if no such item can be found, the selection is cleared. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , | ## Examples 下面的示例将绑定到的集合`Employee`对象。The following example binds a to a collection of `Employee` objects. 该示例设置到`@EmployeeNumber`和到`12345`。The example sets to `@EmployeeNumber` and to `12345`. 这将选择`Employee`具有`12345`的值作为`EmployeeNumber`。This selects the `Employee` that has `12345` as the value of `EmployeeNumber`. 此示例还会将绑定到的。This example also binds a to the of the . 当用户更改中的选定、更新以显示当前所选的员工的员工编号。When the user changes the selection in the , the is updated to show the employee number of the currently selected employee. [!code-xaml[Selector#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Selector/CS/Window1.xaml#2)] [!code-xaml[Selector#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Selector/CS/Window1.xaml#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定用于确定值的属性的路径属性。The property specifies the path to the property that is used to determine the value of the property. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例将绑定到的集合`Employee`对象。The following example binds a to a collection of `Employee` objects. 该示例设置到`@EmployeeNumber`和到`12345`。The example sets to `@EmployeeNumber` and to `12345`. 这将选择`Employee`具有`12345`的值作为`EmployeeNumber`。This selects the `Employee` that has `12345` as the value of `EmployeeNumber`. 此示例还会将绑定到的。This example also binds a to the of the . 当用户更改中的选定、更新以显示当前所选的员工的员工编号。When the user changes the selection in the , the is updated to show the employee number of the currently selected employee. [!code-xaml[Selector#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Selector/CS/Window1.xaml#2)] [!code-xaml[Selector#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Selector/CS/Window1.xaml#3)]

summary.span: 当 的选择更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the selection of a changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对选定内容更改时，将发生此事件。This event occurs whenever there is a change to a selection. 可以更改选择，不仅由用户交互，还通过绑定，以及其他设置值。A selection can be changed not only by user interaction but also by binding as well as other set values. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将附加到列表框控件的事件。The following example shows how to attach the event to a list box control. [!code-xaml[ListBoxEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxEvent/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#1)] 下面的示例演示如何处理事件。The following example shows how to handle the event. [!code-csharp[ListBoxEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxEvent/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ListBoxEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListBoxEvent/VisualBasic/Pane1.xaml.vb#2)]
